wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
NO NO NO! No bloody underscores between words! BIG bloody annoyance! [Sound of light saber being activated] I will lop off the fingers of the first one of you who DARES to even THINK of deprecating Camel and Pascal casing in .NET code!
You freaks who want to code with underscores in Ruby, I hope you, too, get run out of town on a Rail! GRRRRRR!
(No, seriously, underscores are the spawn of Satan).
Have a nice day! :)
